tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very well behaved and very pleasantly explained with care about his treatment and suggestions

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recommend Dr. Soumya Ray to everyone who is having tooth related problem be it major or minor. He is a very caring doctor and takes care of the minute details of the issues the patient is experiencing.He takes care of all the problems with a nice smile which is enough for most of the patients to feel comfortable and accommodative.I think the name 'Soumya' is appropriate for him. I really appreciate the way he treated me. He is very punctual and has state-of-the-art instruments and facilities. Thank you.

tags: None
review: I have visited for the 1st time to a dentist for my father and the experience is quite good with Dr. Roy, he is very patient to hear the problem and provide the proper sollution and also for the treatment. My father was suffering from a serious teeth and gum pain and he now recovering by the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Extremely happy with my dental appointment with Dr. Soumya Ray. The treatment was done with care and proper advice was provided of the do's and don'ts. 
During this pandemic, it is really important to take the necessary precautions for safety of the patients. I was pleased to see that the doctor wore a proper PPE, mask, visor and I could see the clinic staff sanitizing the chair and equipment, when i was waiting outside the room. 
Highly recommend.
reply_text: Thanks a lot Mr Tilak. Itâ€™s always wonderful when patients appreciate the minor details. Will share with the team for sure.

reply_text:
Thanks for your feedback Charu.
It was a pleasure to have treated you and to see your faith in dentists restored.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Soumya is a very kind *** ************* professional. I was very nervous patient and throughout the procedure he did everything to keep me calm. The end results fully matched my expectations. The facilities were impeccable and the team very friendly and courteous. I recommend him to anyone who is looking for a reliable orthodontist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Dr.Soumya has been my dentist for more than two years now.He was recommended to me by a friend and i cant thank her enough.I got ceramic crown fittings,root canal treatment done by him.And he did an excellent job.It changed my appearance and further gave me more confidence.And i smile better now.He is an excellent dentist,well versed with his craft,is polite to a fault,approachable,visits to him are stress free and pain free.Visits to dentists had never been pleasant but that changed after I started visiting Dr.Soumya.I live 40 minutes away from his clinic but there is no one i can trust my teeth with but him.I couldn't recommend him enough.He has his way of putting his patients at ease.
Thankyou Dr.Soumya.Keep putting smiles on people's faces.

review: The best thing about any dental treatment is when patient doesn't feel it at all,  especially  when your teeth is being extracted. Wonderful experience of getting rid of my wisdom tooth didn't felt a bit from injections to extraction !! You will forget all fears and pain related to dental procedures once you visit this clinic. Being Dentist and a patient myself this is now my favourite and best in Kolkata. Thank you so much Dr.Soumya Sir for wonderful treatment. I totally recommend everyone with any dental issues to visit this Star Dentist of the City !!
